title: Everyone's playing checkers, but I've been playing chess for years.
body:
Everyone's playing checkers, but I've been playing chess for years. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
People play board games?

I thought checkers was more dead than chess, to be honest. I prefer chess - I used to be AWESOME at it when I was younger. Then I stopped playing, because vidya games...
